fields.name: *"Please welcome our contestants today:
fields.value:
An Android programmed to destroy the world, the entire civilization of India, and the subject Calculus!"*
Defense: Basic if hosting a game, none otherwise

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every odd day, choose 3 players. They will be placed in a gameshow the next night.
- The gameshow will go on for 1 night.
- You make the rules of the gameshow.
- The gameshow will be a channel that everyone can see.
- Everyone in the gameshow will be roleblocked that night.
- The winner gets a prize of your choice ***or*** the loser gets a penalty of your choice.
- You may only give out 1 prize or penalty per show.
- If possible, you must host a show with participants that did not participate in the last show.

fields.name: Limits to Prizes and Penalties:
fields.value:
- Attack: May only upgrade/downgrade attack 1 stage. Max: Unstoppable
- Defense: May only upgrade/downgrade defense 1 stage. Max: Invincible
- Voting Power: May only give someone 1 extra vote.
- Kill: May only deal up to a Powerful Attack to loser.
- Win Condition: May not effect any win conditions.
